title: Corki
body: Just want to ask why in the hell Corki even has an AP scaling because if you look at him logically nothing he does is actually magic it's all physical.

replies.body:
TL:DR ; you trolling? sorc boots are the only boots a corki should ever buy. for a reason.

Q Magic Damage: 80 / 130 / 180 / 230 / 280 (+50% bonus AD) (+ 50% AP)
W Magic damage Per Second: 60 / 90 / 120 / 150 / 180 (+ 40% AP) 
R Magic Damage: 100 / 180 / 260 (+ 30% AP) (+ 20 / 30 / 40% AD)

what do you mean he doesnt do magic damage?

the reasoning behind AP ratios on older champions who are primarily played AD is because back at the start of this game everyone had AP ratios and not any AD ratios. so trist ashe sivir and corki have AP ratios. there are others but it doesnt matter.

also, because trist and corki have decent AP ratios they can be effectively played AP. aint nothin wrong with the long range BOOM BOOM of AP corkis ults. and lichbane works really well with him, just as well as trinity force does on AD corki.

Tristana only scales with AP.
Its a fantasy video game, just make up some justification like "Oh hey, magic bullets."

He's a Yordle so pseudo-intellectually speaking you could assume that his entire kit runs on some magical piltover engine. And since Yordles are quite magical creatures, just imagine everything they do to be magical and you'll save the nerves thinking about stuff like that.
His Gatling gun, however, is just a plain gatling gun like any other that he scraped from some old dump and hence does physical damage.

The AP scaling comes from "bad" design back in the days when they gave pretty much every Champion AP and AD scaling respectively when they didn't consider the possibility that people might actually make full use of the ridiculously high scalings and not just use it for some extra power by buying a Triforce. I imagine his scaling will be reworked similarly to Yi, Tryndamere and Sion once they do his visual Rework. His damage being split into Physical, Magic and True will not change though, cause that would completely change the champs purpose. And NA Riot (who are in charge of these decisions) always prefer not to "offend" people who main a certain character by completely changing how he works.
so its harder to itemise against him
